peripheralPage.template: \t/** \t * Class used to do initialisation of the $(_class) \t * \t * This class has a templated constructor that accepts various values. \t * \t * @note This constructor may be used to create a const instance in Flash \t * \t * Example: \t * @code \t * static const $(_class)::Init init { \t * \t * // Setup values \t * PortIoflt0Fltdiv3_Lpoclk // Filter Division Set 3, \t * PortIoflt0Fltdiv2_Busclk32 // Filter Division Set 2, \t * PortIoflt0Fltdiv1_Busclk2 // Filter Division Set 1, \t * PortIoflt0Fltnmi_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from NMI, \t * PortIoflt0Fltkbi1_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from KBI1, \t * PortIoflt0Fltkbi0_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from KBI0, \t * PortIoflt0Fltrst_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from RESET/IRQ, \t * PortIoflt0Flth_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTH, \t * PortIoflt0Fltg_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTG, \t * PortIoflt0Fltf_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTF, \t * PortIoflt0Flte_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTE, \t * PortIoflt0Fltd_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTD, \t * PortIoflt0Fltc_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTC, \t * PortIoflt0Fltb_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTB, \t * PortIoflt0Flta_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTA, \t * PortIoflt1Flti2c1_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from SCL1/SDA1, \t * PortIoflt1Flti2c0_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from SCL0/SDA0, \t * PortIoflt1Fltpwt_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from PWT_IN1/PWT_IN0, \t * PortIoflt1Fltftm1_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from FTM1 Channels, \t * PortIoflt1Fltftm0_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from FTM0 Channels, \t * PortIoflt1Fltirq_NoFilter // Filter Selection for Input from IRQ, \t * PortIoflt1Flti_Busclk // Filter Selection for Input from PTI, \t * PortPue0Ptdpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port D, \t * PortPue0Ptcpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port C, \t * PortPue0Ptbpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port B, \t * PortPue0Ptape_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port A, \t * PortPue1Pthpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port H, \t * PortPue1Ptgpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port G, \t * PortPue1Ptfpe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port F, \t * PortPue1Ptepe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port E, \t * PortPue2Ptipe_PullUpDisabled // Pull-up control for Port I, \t * PortHdrvePth1_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port H bit 1, \t * PortHdrvePth0_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port H bit 0, \t * PortHdrvePte1_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port E bit 1, \t * PortHdrvePte0_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port E bit 0, \t * PortHdrvePtd1_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port D bit 1, \t * PortHdrvePtd0_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port D bit 0, \t * PortHdrvePtb5_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port B bit 5, \t * PortHdrvePtb4_LowDriveStrength // High drive enable for Port B bit 4, \t * }; \t * \t * // Initialise $(_class) from values specified above \t * $(_class)::configure(init) \t * @endcode \t */

$(init_description) \tclass Init { \t \tpublic: \t /** \t * Copy Constructor \t */ \t constexpr Init(const Init &other) = default; \t \t /** \t * Default Constructor \t */ \t constexpr Init() = default; \t\n
peripheralPage.initialValueTemplate: \t /// Port Pull-up Enable Register 0 \t uint32_t pue0 = 0;\n\n
\t /// Port Pull-up Enable Register 1 \t uint32_t pue1 = 0;\n\n
\t /// Port Pull-up Enable High Register \t uint32_t pue2 = 0;\n\n
\t /// Port High Drive Enable Register \t uint32_t hdrve = 0;\n\n

for.setTemplate: \t /** \t * Constructor for %description \t * \t * @tparam Types \t * @param rest \t * %comments \t */ \t template <typename... Types> \t constexpr Init(%params, Types... rest) : Init(rest...) { \t \t %registerName = (%registerName&~%mask) | %paramExpression; \t } \t\n

initialValueTemplate.variables: port_ioflt0_fltdiv3, port_ioflt0_fltdiv2, port_ioflt0_fltdiv1, port_ioflt0_fltnmi, port_ioflt0_fltkbi1, port_ioflt0_fltkbi0, port_ioflt0_fltrst, port_ioflt0_flth, port_ioflt0_fltg, port_ioflt0_fltf, port_ioflt0_flte, port_ioflt0_fltd, port_ioflt0_fltc, port_ioflt0_fltb, port_ioflt0_flta, port_ioflt1_flti2c1, port_ioflt1_flti2c0, port_ioflt1_fltpwt, port_ioflt1_fltftm1, port_ioflt1_fltftm0, port_ioflt1_fltirq, port_ioflt1_flti, port_pue0_ptdpe, port_pue0_ptcpe, port_pue0_ptbpe, port_pue0_ptape, port_pue1_pthpe, port_pue1_ptgpe, port_pue1_ptfpe, port_pue1_ptepe, port_pue2_ptipe, port_hdrve_pth1, port_hdrve_pth0, port_hdrve_pte1, port_hdrve_pte0, port_hdrve_ptd1, port_hdrve_ptd0, port_hdrve_ptb5, port_hdrve_ptb4

peripheralPage.initialValueTemplate: $(init_description) \ttypedef $(_class)BasicInfo::Init Init; \t \t/** \t * Default initialisation value for $(_class) \t * This value is created from Configure.usbdmProject settings \t */ \tstatic constexpr Init DefaultInitValue = {%initExpression \t};\n\n
